member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION
member.summary: Holds process information returned by PssQuerySnapshot.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ExitStatus
member.summary: The exit code of the process. If the process has not exited, this is set to STILL_ACTIVE (259).

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PebBaseAddress
member.summary: The address to the process environment block (PEB). Reserved for use by the operating system.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.AffinityMask
member.summary: The affinity mask of the process.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.BasePriority
member.summary: The base priority level of the process.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ProcessId
member.summary: The process ID.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ParentProcessId
member.summary: The parent process ID.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.Flags
member.summary: Flags about the process. For more information, see PSS_PROCESS_FLAGS.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.CreateTime
member.summary: The time the process was created. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ExitTime
member.summary: If the process exited, the time of the exit. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.KernelTime
member.summary: The amount of time the process spent executing in kernel-mode. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.UserTime
member.summary: The amount of time the process spent executing in user-mode. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PriorityClass
member.summary: The priority class.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PeakVirtualSize
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.VirtualSize
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PageFaultCount
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PeakWorkingSetSize
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.WorkingSetSize
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.QuotaPeakPagedPoolUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.QuotaPagedPoolUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.QuotaPeakNonPagedPoolUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.QuotaNonPagedPoolUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PagefileUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PeakPagefileUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.PrivateUsage
member.summary: A memory usage counter. See the function for more information.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ExecuteFlags
member.summary: Reserved for use by the operating system.

member.name: PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION.ImageFileName
member.summary: The full path to the process executable. If the path exceeds the allocated buffer size, it is truncated.
